org.primefaces.push
Interface PushContextListener

public interface PushContextListener

Received PushContext notification when a message has been successfully pushed (@link PushContext#push) or when a client disconnected (the connection has been closed).

Method Summary
 void onComplete(String channel, Object message)
          Invoked when a message has been successfully pushed to channel.
 void onDisconnect(Object request)
          Return the original request that was suspended by the PushServlet.
 

Method Detail

onComplete

void onComplete(String channel,
                Object message)
Invoked when a message has been successfully pushed to channel.

Parameters:
channel - A String used when calling the PushContext.push(String, Object)
message - The message pushed.

onDisconnect

void onDisconnect(Object request)
Return the original request that was suspended by the PushServlet.

Parameters:
request -
